about_the_game:
IN THE YEAR 10000, HUMANITY HAS REALIZED ALL TOO LATE THAT THEIR FATE HAS BEEN SEALED IN DOOM BY THE MALICIOUS VOX AND THE ABYSMAL HORRORS THAT LURK IN THE SURROUNDING DARKNESS. ONLY ONE HOPE REMAINS: AN ULTRA-ADVANCED STARSHIP HELLBENT ON DESTROYING ALL THAT EXISTS TO REBOOT THE UNIVERSE AND RESTORE THE GOLDEN AGE.

GO NOW, SPACE FIGHTER, BRING FORTH CATACLYSMIC DESTRUCTION!

EXPLORE UNIQUE SOLAR SYSTEMS


Tired of space games always having the same, boring, procedurally-generated planets and stars? So am I!



You'll never know what to expect as you hop from system to system, finding uniquely-designed astral bodies, and blasting them to bits as you single-handedly annihilate entire star systems so that you can use star power to jump to the next unsuspecting system as you make your way to the Core of the Universe!

Uncover the secrets of the stars as you explore! What kind of things will you discover? Perhaps you'll stumble across a pirate crew hauling their sweet treasure and decide to claim it as your own. Maybe you'll find a cargo beacon and fight hordes of enemies as you collect shipments of loot? Who knows!!

FIGHT INTENSE SPACE BATTLES


The galaxy has grown treacherous and hostile. The very planets and stars have developed their own defensive mechanisms against those who dare challenge them. Engage in spectacular, multi-phase boss battles featuring bullet-hell combat forcing you to dodge and weave through the onslaught of shots, bombs, lasers, waves, and more!

Prepare for celestial war by blowing up asteroids while fending off pirates, aliens, and cosmic terrors as you search through the system for loot and upgrades to help you along the way.

COLLECT ADVANCED TECHNOLOGIES


Loot or purchase a variety of items to aid you on your mission! From a holographic grid that projects a real-time minimap of the surrounding star system to a tonic that can manipulate the flow of time, you'll encounter a myriad of both consumable and reusable items alike to give you the edge you need to conquer the galaxy.

Collect set pieces to construct different space ships with new arsenals of offensive and defensive abilities, and choose upgrades to play with different builds and see what fits your style.

TRAVERSE THE ABYSS


Amidst the shroud of black fog, eldritch beings wander... to enter it is unthinkable! Don't even think about it.

...but, if you do think about it, there could be great treasures and alien artifacts! Unique relics or even technological constructs lost to civilazation that may indeed prove useful. Just make sure you don't bump into any of the monsters lurking, stalking, scheming...

EXPERIENCE THE DEMO


I'm workin' day and night to fully develop the rest of the game! In the meantime, check out a small slice of what's to come, all for free! The first solar system is available to play through right at this moment, so why not check it out and see if you like it?

Plus, you can join along development by giving feedback, suggestions, and chatting in the official discord server! Updates will be posted as more of the game is finished, and you can even potentially influence the final version of the game!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10*
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual core*
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 760 | AMD Radeon R7 270X or above*
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
  • VR Support: Does not support VR
  • Additional Notes: *Minimum requirements are estimated and may be inaccurate. Mac and Linux support untested. You can help by providing your system specs along with average Frames Per Second to improve accuracy, that would be awesome!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 6-Core Processor -> 3.59 GHz
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
  • VR Support: Does not support VR
  • Additional Notes: Consistently runs at ~244FPS at 2560x1440 (2K) resolution on my computer with these specs, so it should have no problem with computers of average build B]

short_description: Fight fast-paced boss battles against Moons, Planets, and even Stars as you travel through solar systems on a perilous mission to destroy the Core of the Universe as pirates, aliens, and cosmic horrors hunt you down while you explore the depths of the cosmos and collect unique technologies.
